title: Video-Based Language Learning Simulation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Simulation environment for vocational institutions’ language curriculum. Features real-time interaction via VR devices and learning material management through LMS

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain over 80% of language grammatical structures using video-based learning materials
Learners can recall over 90% of key information from graph-text hybrid video content after three exposures
Learners can complete language use simulations reflecting video learning experiences within 72 hours through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
